analysis.career_trajectory: Started with Python in 2020, pivoted to Rust systems programming in late 2023. Also explored various other languages and tools such as C, Go, Perl, Vim Script, Yacc, Shell, and TeX.

technical_obsessions.evidence: No specific evidence found, but they have worked on a project to create driver/software to control performance of razer laptops (Lang: C) which might involve database sharding.

comment_analytics.communication_style: Asks deep architectural questions, Nitpicks code style
